articles.content: Tata Communications said on Tuesday it is partnering with Google Cloud to drive cloud adoption and transform Indian businesses.With this partnership, Tata Communications has further expanded its mana… [+2115 chars]

articles.title: Brookfield REIT lists with marginal premium over issue price at Rs 281.70 - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: The REIT, sponsored by an affiliate of Brookfield Asset Management, raised Rs 3,800 crore through a public issue which was subscribed 7.94 times during February 3-5.
articles.content: Brookfield India Real Estate Trust share price kickstarted trading with a marginal premium at Rs 281.70 on the National Stock Exchange, on February 16, against issue price of Rs 275. On the BSE, the … [+1042 chars]

articles.author: Tarun
articles.title: VW Polo Joins Nissan Magnite As India’s Most Affordable Turbo-Petrol Car - CarDekho
articles.description: This edition makes Volkswagen’s new turbo-petrol engine more affordable for buyers     The Turbo Edition gets cosmetic upgrades such as gloss black spoiler, ORVM caps, Turbo badging, and exclusive seat covers.     Automatic AC added from the top-spec variants…
articles.content:
• The Turbo Edition gets cosmetic upgrades such as gloss black spoiler, ORVM caps, Turbo badging, and exclusive seat covers. 
  • Automatic AC added from the top-spec variants.
